error.title: Scene setting
error.description:
## Invalid Deadline pools found
Configured pools don't match what is set in Deadline.
{invalid_value_str}
### How to repair?
If your instance had deadline pools set on creation, remove or change them.
In other cases inform admin to change them in Settings.
Available deadline pools {pools_str}.
error.detail:
### __Detailed Info__
This error is shown when deadline pool is not on Deadline anymore. It could happen in case of republish old workfile which was created with previous deadline pools, or someone changed pools on Deadline side, but didn't modify Openpype Settings.
